subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The New Yorker essayist Roger Angell is the first nonmember of the Baseball Writers’ Association of America to receive the J. G. Taylor Spink Award.
snippet: The New Yorker essayist Roger Angell is the first nonmember of the Baseball Writers’ Association of America to receive the J. G. Taylor Spink Award.
